text: Sarah what are you doing with all that
garlic what on earth could you be doing
with eight whole heads of garlic I'm
gonna make roasted garlic the cool thing
about roasted garlic is that it
intensifies the sweetness and gets rid
of the bite of garlic so if you haven't
tried it because you think you don't
like garlic maybe you should give this a
try
cut the tops off maybe let's say the top
1/4 so once that all the tops are
exposed what you do is you place them on
a piece of foil on a small baking sheet
and then just line up all your heads of
garlic drizzle with some olive oil salt
and then sometime you could use rosemary
too if you want anything
fragrant sage not parsley or anything
delicate like that just chop it up a
little bit sprinkle it over the top and
then that's it you just wrap it up nice
and tight in your foil 400 degree oven
for one hour you're done done just
unwrap it so that it can cool off a
little bit it's that beautiful beautiful
in gold and not too Brown after you've
let it cool just a little bit you can
easily just squeeze all of the cloves of
garlic right out of the skins so much
fun but definitely wait till it cools a
little bit otherwise you will burn your
fingers and you will not be happy and
you'll be writing me letters it's not my
fault I warned you
squeeze it out get all the delicious
garlic now you can do this with all of
your garlic and keep it in a little jar
in your refrigerator once it gets cold
again it'll get kind of hard and it'll
be more difficult to squeeze out so just
squeeze out the rest of all this garlic
put it in the refrigerator and then you
have it on hand for any use that you can
possibly think of
